typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as short,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> adlsEmpSrc
source(output(
		Deptno as short,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> adlsDeptSrc
adlsEmpSrc, adlsDeptSrc lookup(adlsEmpSrc@DEPTNO == adlsDeptSrc@Deptno,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
